verbose_text: As expected, treatment of cells with a selective PDK1 inhibitor (GSK2334470) [XREF_BIBR] suppressed SGK3 activity, as well as T-loop and hydrophobic motif phosphorylation, to near basal levels, similar to those observed following mutation of the PX domain (XREF_FIG).
evidence: PDK1 inhibitor (GSK2334470) [ XREF_BIBR ] suppressed SGK3 activity, as well as T-loop and hydrophobic motif phosphorylation
